channel.title: Lost Island - FINALLY, A UNIQUE SERVER [LOADS OF PICS]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]PLEASE CLOSE THIS TOPIC AS I REPOSTED AN UPDATED VERSION (no I didn't want to update this one because all the replies are based on this content)[/size]
New topic link: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596272.0.html] HERE[/url]
[hr][hr][hr][hr][hr]
[center][size=12pt][img]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/aha-soft/multimedia/48/favourites-star-SH-icon.png[/img]Welcome to Lost Island ! (VERY UNIQUE) - Scroll down for media! [img]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/aha-soft/multimedia/48/favourites-star-SH-icon.png[/img][/size] ------------------------------ Website: [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org]Click Here[/url] Hiscores: [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/hiscores/overall.php]Click Here[/url] ------------------------------ [/center]
[b]Content:[/b]
[b]Full dueling / Staking[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2qntvh4.png[/img]
[b]Funny reaction when a player gets a extremely rare drop:[/b] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28a8f11.png[/img]
[b]PKING:[/b]
To PK, simply type ::pvpon or ::pvpoff. Both players must have pvpon to fight!
- Perfect combat - Amazing Timers - All specs working - No overpowered weapons - FunPk
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2mgqk4w.png[/img][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2uro211.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/335gw05.png[/img][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/dyp346.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/y07rr.png[/img]
[b]Slayer:[/b]
* Not assigned any task. * Kill any slayer npc you want (location: slayer tower) * Each NPC has there own drop, and can be determined by examining the npc. * Slayer XP is dropped by npcs, and can be cashed in by talking to the slayer master. * Media:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ljhzy1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ry252r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/k9ayc3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/11r7oye.png[/img]
[b]Bosses:[/b]
* Challenging * Great drop rates * Full godwars + corp (penance). Nex finally out (custom).
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/350m4j6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/rlknc9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/deqolz.png[/img]
[b]Crystal Exchanger:[/b]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2z3qgl1.png[/img]
[b]Skilling:[/b]
* Great way to make money! * Woodcutting media:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2808twy.png[/img]
[b]Examine ores for smithing reward:[/b]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ofvwrd.png[/img]
[b]Enchant your items:[/b]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vctge8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2gvkbqh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/e6pzyf.png[/img]
[b]Highscores:[/b] [url=http://highscores.servebeer.com/highscores/overall.php]Click Here[/url]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2nsc07s.png[/img]
[b]Working Quests!:[/b]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2mq0ygh.png[/img]
[b]Custom NPCS:[/b]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/24l50lf.png[/img]
[b]Fishing:[/b]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1hpn41.png[/img]
I know it's alot of content, so instead of reading and looking at pictures, give it a try! The owner (me) is Smitty, and it's always nice to see newcomers join!
[b]Rarest item:[/b]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1z3nqt3.png[/img]
[b]About Donating:[/b] I have always believed that donating should not used to earn or gain an advantage in game. Therefore, you will not be able to donate for max gear etc. Donators get ranks (regular, super, master) + unique little privileges that none-donators do not have. On top of that, donators have the opportunity to add me (Smitty, owner) on skype. I will skype with them whenever the time permits. The only advantage a donator has, is the double xp.
Here is an image of a donator privilege:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/a09b3d.png[/img]
------------------------------ Website: [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org]Click Here[/url] Hiscores: [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/hiscores/overall.php]Click Here[/url] ------------------------------
